title: [KNOWN ISSUE] 1st March 2017 - Ranked LP gains not correct
body:
UPDATE - As you can tell Ranked went back up a little while ago. It appears that the issue is no longer occurring although you will notice some issue with your LP gains and promo series' or demotions if you played 2+ games during the issue period.
See the detailed description at the bottom of this post for more info on what happened.

Hi everyone,

There was a known issue that started after 09:00 AM AEDT today in which ranked game LP changes were not being properly recorded. When later games were recording LP it made it look as though you lost LP or gained very little.

Regrettably, we won't be able to fix any issues with LP or promo/demo issues caused by the issue, but LP gains should normalize you back to where you were supposed to be after a few games because MMR gains appear to have been recorded correctly.

Issue start time: 01 Mar - 09:13 AEDT
Issue end time: 01 Mar - 16:43 AEDT

The real problem becomes visible after you played 2 or more games during this time period.


**More detailed description of issue:**
During the time the issue was occurring, if you played 2 or more ranked games, the games would start failing to record LP changesâ€‹ even though the end of game screen showed no issues (your LP would look like it changed as normal at first).

You would then start gaining/losing LP or promo games as if the games you played previously never existed. So you would see:

- LP losses or no gains after a win (if your missing games were wins)
- Large LP gains after a win or loss (if your missing games were losses)
- Finished promotion series would fail to complete, staying at x out of 3 or 5 games played instead of succeeding or failing (your promo games that were missing basically didn't count and need to be played again)
- Demotion after losing while being above 0 LP (Your wins that got you above 0 LP were not recorded)
